body:
@rsc it's important to both remember and realize that if/once this is added, it can never be removed, as @dlsniper pointed out. 

It would be very nice to see this implemented (as it inevitably will be...) as a `GO18_ALIAS_EXPERIMENT`, much the same as the `vendor` experiment was, and use that to gather usage information, feedback, and usage statistics on it, prior to adding it to the official spec :)
